Service Details: - Provides online database, with search-ability by generic (chemical) or brand (market) name of prescription medications- Results show risks of mixing specific medication with 10 different groups of substances- Created by a Clinical Pharmacist, a Youth Health Nurse and their students, with the most current information results from all available drug and medical resources- Also provides information on the general health effects and risks of alcohol, tobacco, marijuana or other street drugs
Eligibility: Professionals must register to access professional and clinical information
